issue.title: Can you check contacts for cable joints too?

content.raw:
A question on this - looking at some of your pull requests, I see a suggestion that you are able to manipulate just the cable end.  Everything I do in Gazebo seems to require that I move the whole cable assembly.  So the only way I can probe this is with the robot, which is very time consuming.

If there is some easy gazebo trick I'm missing, I'm willing to do a better job of probing this and articulating the issue, if there is even one.
content.html:
A question on this - looking at some of your pull requests, I see a suggestion that you are able to manipulate just the cable end. Everything I do in Gazebo seems to require that I move the whole cable assembly. So the only way I can probe this is with the robot, which is very time consuming.

If there is some easy gazebo trick I'm missing, I'm willing to do a better job of probing this and articulating the issue, if there is even one.
